subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: In China Luan Jujie is known as the determined young woman from Nanjing who was the first and only Chinese fencer to win a gold medal in the Olympics.
snippet: In China Luan Jujie is known as the determined young woman from Nanjing who was the first and only Chinese fencer to win a gold medal in the Olympics.
